entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 25 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness late this evening then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
